== Description ==
Display '<tt>The link you followed has expired.</tt>' message to confirm the action being taken.

If the action has the [[wikipedia:Cryptographic_nonce|nonce]] explain message, then it will be displayed along with the '<tt>Are you sure?</tt>' message.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php wp_nonce_ays( $action ) ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$action|string|The [[wikipedia:Cryptographic_nonce|nonce]] action.}}

== Return Values ==
; (void) : This function does not return a value.
